      • checkContain

        boolean checkContain(BlockNode curr,
                     java.util.ArrayList<BlockNode> next)
        check if current piece could move from calculated next arraylist
        Parameters:
        curr - current block
        next - next arraylist which include all possible move for current piece
        Returns:
        return true if current piece is legal to move

      • fileRank

        boolean fileRank(boolean white,
                 int s,
                 int m,
                 java.util.ArrayList<BlockNode> board)
        "FileRank FileRank" input command Add beta En passant still got bugs: No.1 column a is not working No.2 do not add check En passant chance (every piece only have one time to en passant, if passed, chance gone)
        Parameters:
        white - Identify if current player is white.
        s - The block with current piece you choose.
        m - The block you want to move to.
        board - current board
        Returns:
        return true if legal else return false

        m - target blocknode to move
        board - current board
        Returns:

        boolean checkBlock(int blockIndex,
                   int enemyColor,
                   java.util.ArrayList<BlockNode> board)
        help method: used to check if move is legal
        Parameters:
        blockIndex - Index of block player wants to move
        enemyColor - Index of current piece's enemy's color 1:white 2:black
        board - current board
        Returns:
        if block player choosed is legal return true
